title: Shah Rukh Khan David Letterman:The First Trailer Of David Letterman’s Episode With Shah Rukh Khan Is Out & It Promises To Be Great Fun
text:
The First Trailer Of David Letterman’s Episode With Shah Rukh Khan Is Out & It Promises To Be Great Fun

The First Trailer Of David Letterman’s Episode With Shah Rukh Khan Is Out & It Promises To Be Great Fun

Shah Rukh Khan... naam toh suna hoga?

The King of hearts and the Badshah of Bollywood, Shah Rukh Khan appeared on My Next Guest Needs No Introduction With David Letterman, and that indeed has to be a special episode, right?

The first ever trailer that reveals the fun banter between the two legendary personalities is finally here, and we just cannot stop gushing.

Screengrab/Youtube

In the trailer, David Letterman introduces him as “the most popular movie film star in the world.”

Screengrab

We all know that Shah Rukh Khan has gazillion fans all over the world. And they are all crazy for him. So, when he entered the show, “immediately the audience went crazy… like, oh my goodness!” says David Letterman adding that it was “perhaps, the biggest ovation we have had in the series.”

Don't Miss 7.8 K SHARES 303 SHARES 1.2 K SHARES

Screengrab

For the unversed, David Letterman visited Shah Rukh Khan at his home, Mannat, in Mumbai on the occasion of Eid. He was taken aback with the amount of love he receives from people. Shah Rukh Khan, being the ruler of hearts, cooked Italian for him.

Screengrab

And while Letterman is helping him by chopping veggies, he pretends to have cut his finger. He screams loudly as he clutches his own hands. How did Shah Rukh Khan react to his acting skills? He seemed unimpressed. “The scripting was very good. The performance fell short,” he jokes as his smiling gleefully.

Screengrab

Without further ado, watch the fun banter between David Letterman and Shah Rukh Khan in the video below.

The episode will be out of Oct 25. Mark the date, guys! It seems a lot fun, doesn’t it?
